original_text: The second son he named Ephraim and said, “It is because God has made me fruitful in the land of my suffering.”
korean_text: 차남의 이름을 에브라임이라 하였으니 하나님이 나를 내가 수고한 땅에서 번성하게 하셨다 함이었더라

sentences.original_text: The second son he named Ephraim
"It is because God has made me fruitful
in the land of my suffering."
